# Ignore compiled class files
*.class

# Ignore log files
*.log

# Ignore temporary files
*.tmp
*.bak
*.swp

# Ignore generated files and directories
/build/
/target/
/out/

# Ignore Tomcat work directory (if inside project)
work/

# Ignore Eclipse project files
*.classpath
*.project
.settings/

# Ignore IntelliJ project files
*.iml
.idea/
*.iws

# Ignore macOS system files
.DS_Store

# Ignore Windows system files
Thumbs.db

# Ignore MySQL connector JAR (can be downloaded separately)
mysql-connector-java*.jar
